original_text: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying, If a man die, and have no son, then ye shall cause his inheritance to pass unto his daughter.
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르기를 사람이 죽고 아들이 없으면 그의 기업을 그의 딸에게 돌릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel,
then ye shall cause his inheritance to pass unto his daughter.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 상속을 그의 딸에게 주게 하라.
